result.eng: The contract should be looked at closely again.
result.ga: Ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arís
result.orig: Ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arís
result.html: Ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arísThe contract should be looked at closely again.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart aṁarc go géar ar an ċonraḋ arísThe contract should be looked at closely again.

result.eng: I will need to the contract in writing.
result.ga: Beidh an conradh uaim i scríbhinn
result.orig: Beidh an conradh uaim i scríbhinn
result.html: Beidh an conradh uaim i scríbhinnI will need to the contract in writing.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an conraḋ uaim i scríḃinnI will need to the contract in writing.

result.html: Tá conradh buan agamI have a permanent contract.
result.ponchtml: Tá conraḋ buan agamI have a permanent contract.

result.html: Shínigh mé conradh dhá bhliainI signed a two-year contract.
result.ponchtml: Ṡíniġ mé conraḋ ḋá ḃliainI signed a two-year contract.

result.eng: I only have a temporary contract.
result.html: Níl agam ach conradh sealadachI only have a temporary contract.
result.ponchtml: Níl agam aċ conraḋ sealadaċI only have a temporary contract.

result.eng: I'm not employed here, I'm on contract.
result.ga: Níl mé fostaithe anseo tá mé ar conradh
result.orig: Níl mé fostaithe anseo tá mé ar conradh
result.html: Níl mé fostaithe anseo tá mé ar conradhI'm not employed here, I'm on contract.
result.ponchtml: Níl mé fostaiṫe anseo tá mé ar conraḋI'm not employed here, I'm on contract.

result.eng: I need to talk to you about my contract.
result.ga: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradh
result.orig: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradh
result.html: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradhI need to talk to you about my contract.
result.ponchtml: Teastaíonn uaim laḃairt leat maidir le mo ċonraḋI need to talk to you about my contract.
